metadata.title: CVE-2024-7057 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting allversions starting from 16.7 prior to 17.0.5, starting from 17.1 prior to17.1.3, and starting from 17.2 prior to 17.2.1 where job artifacts can beinappropriately exposed to users lacking the proper authorization level.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
